mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select:
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(A.iboard) / #{recordCnt}) FROM t_board A
INNER JOIN t_board_fav C ON A.iboard = C.iboard AND C.iuser = #{iuser}
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, A.ctnt, B.unm AS writerNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
